area.key: Generate XPath from a content node.
Select the content to generate the XPath from.
XPath for the selected content, relative to the root, (-1). Useful for the Multi Node Tree Picker.
XPath for the selected content, relative to the content node at level 1. Useful for the Multi Node Tree Picker.
XPath for the selected content, relative to the content node at level 1 with a specific id. Useful for UmbracoHelper.ContentAtXPath(xpath) and UmbracoHelper.ContentSingleAtXPath(xpath).
Enter XPath to find content by.
The content found by the entered XPath.
